PAD.synopsis: ShadowHeart reacting on picking up "Selune Prayer Book"Location: SCL -> Tollhouse - Seized Inventory Room.She reacts both when she picks up the book or when another character does that.
PAD.how_to_trigger: Pick up "Selune Prayer Book"Location: SCL -> Tollhouse - Seized Inventory Room.ONLY triggers if you pick up the book before reading it.

automatic_ordering.reasoning: The provided input includes only one session ('PAD'). With only one session and no additional sessions to compare or sequence, there are no ordering constraints or mutual exclusiveness rules applicable.

PAD_0.speaker: Shadowheart
PAD_0.text: A Selûne prayer book. Hmm, well she didn't answer any prayers from this place.

PAD_1.speaker: Shadowheart
PAD_1.text: A prayer book won't be much help to us in this place. We should leave it behind.
PAD_1.context: NodeContext: A suggestion to a companion

PAD_2.speaker: Shadowheart
PAD_2.text: A Selûne prayer book. As if I need this weighing me down.
PAD_2.context: NodeContext: seh-LOON-eh. Small derisive snort before 'as if I need'

PAD_3.speaker: Shadowheart
PAD_3.text: A Selûne prayer book? We should leave it, unless we need kindling for our campfire.
PAD_3.context: NodeContext: seh-LOON-eh. Dismissive suggestion to a companion
